channel.title: Server issues i need dealt with
channel.description:
Problems on my server if any1 can help me with...
1. Magic on Players does not work.
2. How do i put a cap on my total level so it only changes as players gain stats and not when they gain levels and loose or gain hp?
3. How do i put a cap on my hp so Guthans Special does not make it go over the limit?
4. Players stats randomly lower at times, how do i fix?
5. Beards work but not when i put on frem helms, or med helms, how do i fix?
Ok, so if ANYBODY can help me fix these problems id greatly appreciate that, thanks.
